sentences.en: Don't bring any riff - raff into my house!
sentences.cn: 别把不叁不四的人领到我家来!

sentences.en: The unofficial Maker Faire mascot is this robotic giraffe, known as the Rave'Raff.
sentences.cn: 非官方的设备费尔吉祥物是这个机器人长颈鹿, 因为狂欢'拉夫称.

sentences.en: Who let all this riff raff into the room?
sentences.cn: 谁让这些乱七八糟的东西进来的?

trans.tran_cn: 大量，（乱七八糟的）一大堆
